column4: Question regarding laptop LCD brightness.  I can manually change it in the /proc/... but gnome applet doesn't allow me to change it, how can i go about making this more convenient?
most laptops have it on the keyboard.  For me it's Fn + up or down arrows
ya those dont work.  dmesg tells me to assign them.
ya those dont work.  dmesg tells me to assign them.
